Today, Dan and Jordan check in on Alex to see how he is doing.  In this installment, Alex brags about "waking up" people, decides that he is really into [[Glenn Beck]] now, and gets weird with his daughter over breakfast.

*Alex was never so drastic in his predictions
*1998 clip: 2 years to collapse
*We're the bad guys because we're not rugged enough
*Criminals are being released to usher in the Euro
*Background: Timothy Simpkins shooting
*FDA documents: vaccine causes spontaneous abortion
*Japan takes Moderna vaccine off market
*7 booster shots a year! Just like in a fake [[Bill Gates]] prospectus!

*Time to set up independent Christian cities
*Alex isn't bragging, but he woke up Tucker and Glenn Beck

*Globalists hate you because you're beautifu... ad plug

*When do you take the law into your own hands? When you have nothing left to lose

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/12/episode-626-december-9-2021 Episode #626: December 9, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex asserts that Timothy Simpkins was released on bail because he is black. This is not a [https://nypost.com/2021/10/07/suspected-texas-high-school-shooter-released-from-jail/ fair assessment] of [https://nypost.com/2021/10/07/suspected-texas-school-shooter-timothy-george-simpkins-was-bullied-family/ the situation].
